Key Match Events: Bhutan won the toss and elected to field first against Maldives.
Bhutan lost their opening match against Thailand by a big margin of 77 runs.
Maldives defeated Indonesia by 23 runs in a rain-affected match, with the result declared by the DLS method.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is part of the Quadrangular T20I series being held at Gelephu International Cricket Ground in Bhutan.
The inauguration of Gelephu International Cricket Ground in Bhutan.
